attributes.action: Petition to see all viewpoints and major parties represented in a Brexit Debate.
attributes.additional_details: We want to see all viewpoints ranging from supporters of a ‘Hard Brexit’ to supporters of the ‘People’s Vote’. The citizens of this country have thus far been locked out of the Brexit process and it’s if upmost importance that they know the variety of options of which are still on the table. Sign this to include the smaller parties in this essential debate.
attributes.background: With Brexit looming and the deal being out towards parliament our time grows short. It has been announced that there is to be a debate between Jeremy Corbyn & Theresa May on the issue of the deal, however this is not good enough. We ask that you sign to see all major party representatives included.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of the broadcasters and political parties and not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
